description: Melting Chair & Salad Home

description: Tracing the immaterial - how to preserve time in pictorial and object matter.

description: Expressing the pure duration of time through conscious repetitive actions.

name: Edward Slaviero
description: My contribution to creating awareness. A dialogue about plastic’s overabundance and the beauty of a material that is not usually seen as valuable. Designing a contradiction namely the most iconic and valuable furniture piece: a throne made of plastic waste from different dutch beaches.

description: And now it's not your turn anymore.

description: The nature as a machine.

description: Break the rule of our familiar situation by using surprise elements.

description: The city as a landscape introduces a path of interventions in the city for us, the distracted.

name: Kornelija Chaleckyte
description: What other appearances and passing though routines could a wall have?

name: Aref Dashti
description: It is equally Fatal for the mind to have a system and to have none. It will simply have to decide to combine the two.

description: The memories that remain after the festival are the moments you are in awe of your surroundings.

description: Creating a flexible wooden housing system that can grow and adapt together with the needs of its residents.

description: Amboina. The culture of Ambon tells its story by vizualizing a pattern. Whether the reinterpretation of marquetry deriving from Art Deco emphasizes its value.

description: Intimacy, a project that gives the adults an opportunity to experience the physical part of sense of security, through different actions that give a tactile experience.

description: Connecting spirit with nature by physical activity.
